## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT5G24290](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT5G24290)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>MEB2</u>
- **Gene Name:** MEMBRANE OF ER BODY 2
- **Description:**   Vacuolar iron transporter (VIT) family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Plant Ontology Annotations:
   - [PO:0009005](https://browser.planteome.org/amigo/term/PO:0009005)&nbsp;---&nbsp;root&nbsp;---&nbsp;raíz (Spanish, exact), radices (exact, plural), radix (exact), 根 (Japanese, exact), aerial root (narrow), climbing root (narrow)
## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [CS69090]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;The plants do not accumulate MEB2 protein.
   - [CS69091]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;The plants do not accumulate MEB2 protein.
   - [CS69092]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;The plants do not accumulate MEB1 and MEB2 proteins.
   - [CS69093]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;The plants do not accumulate MEB1 and MEB2 proteins. Expression of a homologous gene, At4g27870 is reduced.
   - [CS69094]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;The plants do not accumulate MEB1 and MEB2 proteins. Expression of a homologous gene, At4g27870 is reduced.
